statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_POND_BILL_SUPPLIES_HISTORY.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into PM_POND_BILL_SUPPLIES_HISTORY ( I_INTID, C_WGTLISTNO, C_PLANNO, C_WAGNO, C_MATERIALNO, C_MATERIALNAME, C_FROMDEPTNO, C_FROMDEPTNAME, C_FROMSTORENO, C_FROMSTORENAME, C_TODEPTNO, C_TODEPTNAME, C_TOSTORENO, C_TOSTORENAME, C_SHIPNO, C_FROMSTATION, C_SERIALNO, C_DELIVERYNO, C_CONTRACTNO, C_PROJECTNO, C_WAYBILLNO, C_MARSHALLINGNO, I_BUSINESSTYPE, I_WEIGHTTYPE, I_TARETYPE, I_MOVESTILLTYPE, D_PLANLIMITTIME, C_PONDLIMIT, N_GROSSWGT, N_TAREWGT, N_NETWGT, D_GROSSWGTTIME, D_TAREWGTTIME, D_NETWGTTIME, C_GROSSWGTSITENO, C_GROSSWGTSITENAME, C_TAREWGTSITENO, C_TAREWGTSITENAME, C_GROSSWGTMAN, C_TAREWGTMAN, C_TRAINGROUPGROSS, C_TRAINGROUPTARE, C_PLANSTATUS, C_UPLOADSTATUS, C_REMARK, C_PONDREMARK, C_RESERVE1, C_RESERVE2, C_RESERVE3, I_RESERVE1, I_RESERVE2, I_RESERVE3, C_RESERVEFLAG1, C_RESERVEFLAG2, C_RESERVEFLAG3, I_RESERVEFLAG1, I_RESERVEFLAG2, I_RESERVEFLAG3, I_DATAFLAG, I_BILLSTATUS, C_PLANCREATEUSER, C_PLANCREATETIME, D_CREATETIME, D_UPDATETIME, C_CREATEUSER, C_UPDATEUSER, I_PRINTNUM, C_UPDATECOLUMNS, C_UPDATEHISTORYUSER, C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME, C_COMPUTERIP, C_SHIPNAME, C_PLAN_ID, C_DECLARATIONNO )values ( #IntId#, #WgtlistNo#, #PlanNo#, #WagNo#, #MaterialNo#, #MaterialName#, #FromDeptNo#, #FromDeptName#, #FromStoreNo#, #FromStoreName#, #ToDeptNo#, #ToDeptName#, #ToStoreNo#, #ToStoreName#, #ShipNo#, #FromStation#, #SerialNo#, #DeliveryNo#, #ContractNo#, #ProjectNo#, #WayBillNo#, #MarshallingNo#, #BusinessType.IntValue#, #WeightType.IntValue#, #TareType.IntValue#, #MoveStillType.IntValue#, #PlanLimitTime#, #PondLimit#, #GrossWgt#, #TareWgt#, #NetWgt#, #GrossWgtTime#, #TareWgtTime#, #NetWgtTime#, #GrossWgtSiteNo#, #GrossWgtSiteName#, #TareWgtSiteNo#, #TareWgtSiteName#, #GrossWgtMan#, #TareWgtMan#, #TrainGroupGross#, #TrainGroupTare#, #PlanStatus#, #UpLoadStatus#, #Remark#, #PondRemark#, #CReserve1#, #CReserve2#, #CReserve3#, #IReserve1#, #IReserve2#, #IReserve3#, #CReserveFlag1#, #CReserveFlag2#, #CReserveFlag3#, #IReserveFlag1#, #IReserveFlag2#, #IReserveFlag3#, #DataFlag.EntityValue#, #BillStatus.IntValue#, #PlanCreateUser#, #PlanCreateTime#, #CreateTime#, #UpdateTime#, #CreateUser#, #UpdateUser#, #PrintNum#, #UpDateColumns#, #UpDateHistoryUser#, #UpDateHistoryTime#, #ComputerIp#, #ShipName#, #Plan_Id#, #DeclarationNo# )
statements.select:
select I_INTID, C_WGTLISTNO, C_PLANNO, C_WAGNO, C_MATERIALNO, C_MATERIALNAME, C_FROMDEPTNO, C_FROMDEPTNAME, C_FROMSTORENO, C_FROMSTORENAME, C_TODEPTNO, C_TODEPTNAME, C_TOSTORENO, C_TOSTORENAME, C_SHIPNO, C_FROMSTATION, C_SERIALNO, C_DELIVERYNO, C_CONTRACTNO, C_PROJECTNO, C_WAYBILLNO, C_MARSHALLINGNO, I_BUSINESSTYPE, I_WEIGHTTYPE, I_TARETYPE, I_MOVESTILLTYPE, D_PLANLIMITTIME, C_PONDLIMIT， N_GROSSWGT, N_TAREWGT, N_NETWGT, D_GROSSWGTTIME, D_TAREWGTTIME, D_NETWGTTIME, C_GROSSWGTSITENO, C_GROSSWGTSITENAME, C_TAREWGTSITENO, C_TAREWGTSITENAME, C_GROSSWGTMAN, C_TAREWGTMAN, C_TRAINGROUPGROSS, C_TRAINGROUPTARE, C_PLANSTATUS, C_UPLOADSTATUS, C_REMARK, C_PONDREMARK, C_RESERVE1, C_RESERVE2, C_RESERVE3, I_RESERVE1, I_RESERVE2, I_RESERVE3, C_RESERVEFLAG1, C_RESERVEFLAG2, C_RESERVEFLAG3, I_RESERVEFLAG1, I_RESERVEFLAG2, I_RESERVEFLAG3, I_DATAFLAG, I_BILLSTATUS, C_PLANCREATEUSER, C_PLANCREATETIME, D_CREATETIME, D_UPDATETIME, C_CREATEUSER, C_UPDATEUSER, I_PRINTNUM, C_UPDATECOLUMNS, C_UPDATEHISTORYUSER, C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME, C_COMPUTERIP, C_SHIPNAME, C_PLAN_ID, C_DECLARATIONNO
from PM_POND_BILL_SUPPLIES_HISTORY where 1=1
C_WGTLISTNO=#WgtlistNo#
C_PlANNO=#PlanNo#
C_WAGNO=#WagNo#
C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
order by C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME desc

select I_INTID, C_WGTLISTNO, C_PLANNO, C_WAGNO, C_MATERIALNO, C_MATERIALNAME, C_FROMDEPTNO, C_FROMDEPTNAME, C_FROMSTORENO, C_FROMSTORENAME, C_TODEPTNO, C_TODEPTNAME, C_TOSTORENO, C_TOSTORENAME, C_SHIPNO, C_FROMSTATION, C_SERIALNO, C_DELIVERYNO, C_CONTRACTNO, C_PROJECTNO, C_WAYBILLNO, C_MARSHALLINGNO, I_BUSINESSTYPE, I_WEIGHTTYPE, I_TARETYPE, I_MOVESTILLTYPE, D_PLANLIMITTIME, C_PONDLIMIT, N_GROSSWGT, N_TAREWGT, N_NETWGT, D_GROSSWGTTIME, D_TAREWGTTIME, D_NETWGTTIME, C_GROSSWGTSITENO, C_GROSSWGTSITENAME, C_TAREWGTSITENO, C_TAREWGTSITENAME, C_GROSSWGTMAN, C_TAREWGTMAN, C_TRAINGROUPGROSS, C_TRAINGROUPTARE, C_PLANSTATUS, C_UPLOADSTATUS, C_REMARK, C_PONDREMARK, C_RESERVE1, C_RESERVE2, C_RESERVE3, I_RESERVE1, I_RESERVE2, I_RESERVE3, C_RESERVEFLAG1, C_RESERVEFLAG2, C_RESERVEFLAG3, I_RESERVEFLAG1, I_RESERVEFLAG2, I_RESERVEFLAG3, I_DATAFLAG, I_BILLSTATUS, C_PLANCREATEUSER, C_PLANCREATETIME, D_CREATETIME, D_UPDATETIME, C_CREATEUSER, C_UPDATEUSER, I_PRINTNUM, C_UPDATECOLUMNS, C_UPDATEHISTORYUSER, C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME, C_COMPUTERIP, C_SHIPNAME, C_PLAN_ID, C_DECLARATIONNO from PM_POND_BILL_SUPPLIES_HISTORY where C_WGTLISTNO=#WgtlistNo# and I_RESERVEFLAG1 = 0
statements.update: update PM_POND_BILL_SUPPLIES_HISTORY set C_WGTLISTNO=#WgtlistNo#, C_PLANNO=#PlanNo#, C_WAGNO=#WagNo#, C_MATERIALNO=#MaterialNo#, C_MATERIALNAME=#MaterialName#, C_FROMDEPTNO=#FromDeptNo#, C_FROMDEPTNAME=#FromDeptName#, C_FROMSTORENO=#FromStoreNo#, C_FROMSTORENAME=#FromStoreName#, C_TODEPTNO=#ToDeptNo#, C_TODEPTNAME=#ToDeptName#, C_TOSTORENO=#ToStoreNo#, C_TOSTORENAME=#ToStoreName#, C_SHIPNO=#ShipNo#, C_FROMSTATION=#FromStation#, C_SERIALNO=#SerialNo#, C_DELIVERYNO=#DeliveryNo#, C_CONTRACTNO=#ContractNo#, C_PROJECTNO=#ProjectNo#, C_WAYBILLNO=#WayBillNo#, C_MARSHALLINGNO=#MarshallingNo#, I_BUSINESSTYPE=#BusinessType.IntValue#, I_WEIGHTTYPE=#WeightType.IntValue#, I_TARETYPE=#TareType.IntValue#, I_MOVESTILLTYPE=#MoveStillType.IntValue#, D_PLANLIMITTIME=#PlanLimitTime#, C_PONDLIMIT=#PondLimit#, N_GROSSWGT=#GrossWgt#, N_TAREWGT=#TareWgt#, N_NETWGT=#NetWgt#, D_GROSSWGTTIME=#GrossWgtTime#, D_TAREWGTTIME=#TareWgtTime#, D_NETWGTTIME=#NetWgtTime#, C_GROSSWGTSITENO=#GrossWgtSiteNo#, C_GROSSWGTSITENAME=#GrossWgtSiteName#, C_TAREWGTSITENO=#TareWgtSiteNo#, C_TAREWGTSITENAME=#TareWgtSiteName#, C_GROSSWGTMAN=#GrossWgtMan#, C_TAREWGTMAN=#TareWgtMan#, C_TRAINGROUPGROSS=#TrainGroupGross#, C_TRAINGROUPTARE=#TrainGroupTare#, C_PLANSTATUS=#PlanStatus#, C_UPLOADSTATUS=#UpLoadStatus#, C_REMARK=#Remark#, C_PONDREMARK=#PondRemark#, C_RESERVE1=#CReserve1#, C_RESERVE2=#CReserve2#, C_RESERVE3=#CReserve3#, I_RESERVE1=#IReserve1#, I_RESERVE2=#IReserve2#, I_RESERVE3=#IReserve3#, C_RESERVEFLAG1=#CReserveFlag1#, C_RESERVEFLAG2=#CReserveFlag2#, C_RESERVEFLAG3=#CReserveFlag3#, I_RESERVEFLAG1=#IReserveFlag1#, I_RESERVEFLAG2=#IReserveFlag2#, I_RESERVEFLAG3=#IReserveFlag3#, I_DATAFLAG=#DataFlag.EntityValue#, I_BILLSTATUS=#BillStatus.IntValue#, C_PLANCREATEUSER=#PlanCreateUser#, C_PLANCREATETIME=#PlanCreateTime#, D_CREATETIME=#CreateTime#, D_UPDATETIME=#UpdateTime#, C_CREATEUSER=#CreateUser#, C_UPDATEUSER=#UpdateUser#, I_PRINTNUM=#PrintNum#, C_UPDATECOLUMNS=#UpDateColumns#, C_UPDATEHISTORYUSER=#UpDateHistoryUser#, C_UPDATEHISTORYTIME=#UpDateHistoryTime#, C_COMPUTERIP=#ComputerIp#, C_SHIPNAME=#ShipName#, C_PLAN_ID=#Plan_Id#, C_DECLARATIONNO=#DeclarationNo# where C_WGTLISTNO=#WgtlistNo# and I_RESERVEFLAG1 = 0

update PM_Pond_Bill_Supplies_History set C_ComputerIp=#ComputerIp#, C_UpDateHistoryUser=#UpDateHistoryUser#, C_UpDateHistoryTime=#UpDateHistoryTime#, I_ReserveFlag1=#IReserveFlag1# where I_IntId = #IntId#
